channel.title: God's Light for Dark Times
channel.description: Pastor Steve Brown shares truth about the state of the American Church and the deep truths of Jesus Christ.

item.title: "Hero's of the Faith" by Pastor Steve Brown
item.description: Pastor Steve Brown's mp3 audio message preached 5-30-93, uploaded 4-26-09.

item.title: "How I Was Filled With the Holy Ghost" by Pastor Steve Brown
item.description: Pastor Steve Brown's video testimony of how he was filled with the Holy Ghost.

item.title: "Is Barrack Obama the anti-Christ?" by Pastor Steve Brown, M.Div., Asbury Seminary
item.description: Pastor Brown deals with the latest rumors using what the Bible tells about the Anti-Christ.

item.title: "The Iraq War - A Christian Perspective" by Pastor Steve Brown, M.Div., Asbury Seminary
item.description: Pastor Brown discusses the Iraq War using sound Christian theology as he discusses if it is a just war.

item.title: "How God Changes a Heart" How Jesus comes into your heart
item.description: Pastor Steve Brown explains the process of the new birth on this short video.
